name: Catesar
description: Great dictator of whole Kitchen Empire. Poet, philosopher, author of night sonnets "Meow Meow" and "Mur Mur Mur". Favorite food: olives and sardines.

name: Catpoleon
description: Conquered all the cakes in the world. Created a cheese army. He made all the mice obey him and fear his name.

name: Neferkitty
description: Empress and the wife of Pharaoh's cat. Neferkitty was known throughout Egypt for its beauty. Favorite toy: a plush snake.
